new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-10-27 13:00:00) positions.

The portfolio adjustments I made:
1. Reduced AMD from 4 to 2 shares (sold 2)
2. Reduced PEP from 4 to 2 shares (sold 2)  
3. Reduced XEL from 2 to 1 share (sold 1)
4. Added 1 share of META at $749.91
5. Added 1 share of ASML at $1051.567

These changes help diversify the portfolio while maintaining exposure to growth sectors. META adds social media/digital advertising exposure, and ASML adds semiconductor equipment manufacturing exposure, complementing the existing chip stocks (NVDA, AMD, QCOM).

The portfolio now has a better balance with reduced concentration in underperforming positions and added exposure to strong performers in different tech sub-sectors.

<FINISH_SIGNAL>
